statements: SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 123;
SELECT post_id, likes FROM engagement_metrics WHERE comments > 10;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM engagement_metrics WHERE shares < 5;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE post_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT post_id, shares, likes, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 20;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 AND shares >= 50;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM engagement_metrics WHERE comments < 20 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY shares ASC, post_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id AS id, likes AS num_likes, comments AS num_comments, shares AS num_shares FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes + comments > 200 AND shares < 10;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_id, comments FROM posts WHERE shares < 50 ORDER BY comments ASC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT username, posts.post_content, likes FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id WHERE users.user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes FROM posts WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username, post_content, likes FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE user_id = 10 AND shares > 50;
SELECT username, post_content, likes, comments FROM users JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_content FROM social_media_posts WHERE author_id = 5;
SELECT post_id, likes FROM engagement_metrics WHERE comments > 10;
SELECT post_id, shares FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY shares DESC;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE author_id = 5 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, author_id FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, email, join_date FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_title, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE post_id = 10;
SELECT post_title, likes, shares FROM posts WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT post_title, comments FROM posts WHERE post_id = 15 AND shares < 50;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT post_title, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id DESC;

SELECT posts.post_id, posts.post_title, COUNT(post_comments.comment_id) AS num_comments FROM posts LEFT JOIN post_comments ON posts.post_id = post_comments.post_id GROUP BY posts.post_id HAVING num_comments > 5;
SELECT posts.post_title, users.username FROM posts INNER JOIN users ON posts.post_id = users.user_id WHERE posts.shares > 50 ORDER BY posts.post_title ASC;
SELECT posts.post_title, COUNT(post_likes.like_id) AS num_likes FROM posts LEFT JOIN post_likes ON posts.post_id = post_likes.post_id GROUP BY posts.post_id ORDER BY num_likes DESC;

SELECT posts.post_title, post_comments.comment_text, users.username FROM posts JOIN post_comments ON posts.post_id = post_comments.post_id JOIN users ON post_comments.user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.username = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM posts ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_content, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE post_id=1;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(likes) as total_likes FROM post_likes GROUP BY post_id HAVING total_likes > 10 ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT post_id, username FROM posts JOIN users ON posts.post_id = users.user_id;
SELECT post_content, comments FROM posts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY posts.post_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes FROM posts ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE shares > 100 ORDER BY comments ASC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE likes > 500 AND shares < 50;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes, shares FROM posts WHERE post_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY likes DESC, shares ASC;
